title: Barbarian's Bride
description: Nora says she’s happy.Dagesh isn’t so sure. He loves his pretty human mate and wants nothing more than to bring a smile to her face…so she’ll go running into his arms. When he asks the tribe what she’s missing, someone suggests a wedding.All right, then. He’ll throw the best barbarian wedding ever.So how does Nora tell her determined, thoughtful mate that what she wanted wasn’t a wedding…but something a little different in bed?
author: Ruby Dixon
